scripts.setup:api: cd apps/api && python3 -m venv .venv && .venv/bin/pip install --upgrade pip && .venv/bin/pip install -e '.[dev]'
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules apps/*/node_modules apps/*/.next apps/*/.turbo .turbo .pytest_cache .mypy_cache .ruff_cache apps/api/.pytest_cache apps/api/.mypy_cache apps/api/.ruff_cache apps/api/**/__pycache__ apps/api/**/*.pyc apps/api/*.egg-info apps/api/dist apps/api/build package-lock.json && echo 'Cleaned all generated files (kept .venv)'
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && rm -rf .venv apps/api/.venv && echo 'Full clean completed - removed .venv too'
